mapper.select: select * from project where project_seq in(SELECT project_seq FROM project_member where member_seq = #{member_seq})
SELECT DISTINCT p.*,pm.projmember_type,pm.member_seq FROM project p join project_member pm ON p.member_seq=pm.member_seq AND pm.project_seq =p.project_seq WHERE pm.member_seq=#{member_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (project_title, project_content, project_startdate, project_duedate, member_seq) VALUES(#{project_title},#{project_content},#{project_startdate},#{project_duedate},#{member_seq})
INSERT INTO project_member (projmember_type, project_seq, member_seq) VALUES("0",#{project_seq},#{member_seq})
